original_text:
then these also would be sins to be judged,
    for I would have been unfaithful to God on high.
korean_text: 그것도 재판에 회부할 죄악이니 내가 그리하였으면 위에 계신 하나님을 속이는 것이리라

sentences.original_text: then these also would be sins
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 이것들 또한 죄가 될 것입니다

sentences.original_text: for I would have been unfaithful
